sub_title: Customer Experience| E-commerce Marketing| Omnichannel| Analytics Translator | Martech | Global T-shaped marketer
summary:
I have a knack for driving vision and change by connecting e-commerce & market trends, and client needs to prodigious and sustainable business growth.

I do this by building data-driven business cases and engaging teams and stakeholders so that I can manage the creative process to bring unique ideas to the market. I have done this throughout my career in countless national and multinational e-commerce, omnichannel and marketing initiatives. I thrive in environments where I can build fruitful strategic partnerships to connect people to business opportunities. In that sense, I am known as a hub facilitating growth and innovation within the team and the organization. I am also Brazilian and an EU citizen who brings a multinational perspective to the workplace.

Some of my key skills include:
B2C & D2C e-commerce Strategies, B2B, Google Analytics , Salesforce, CRM, JIRA, Confluence, CMS, Trello, Omnichannel Business, Omnichannel Strategy, Canvas, KanBan, SWOT, Cognos, Qlink, CRM, Innovation Management, Google Tag Manager, SEO, Analytical Thinking, Business Development, Decision Quality, Interpersonal Savvy, Motivating Others, Drive For Results, Strategic Agility, Managing Vision And Purpose, Leadership, Negotiation, Budget Management, Artificial Intelligence Understanding, Analytics Tools, A/B Tests, Google Analytics, Facebook Insights, Twitter Analytics, Comscore, SocialBakers, Oracle, Cognos, Excel, PowerPoint, Keynote, Salesforce, Atlassian, Purchase Journey, eCRM, Customer Acquisition, Service Creation and Product Development, Coolhunting, Communication Strategy, Content Planning, Analytics Translator, Reports and Dashboards, Team development, Teamwork, Goal and Data-Oriented, q-commerce, dark stores.

awards.title: Best Project
awards.description: At the end of the internship, the project called BioHighTech in Brazil: increasing the reach of Italian companies in the new market was honored as one of the three best of the Origini 18 course.

awards.title: Diamond Shop
awards.description:
Every year, E-bit, recognized as the most respected e-commerce information source, awards the "E-bit Best E-commerce Stores"  to the best online retail stores in Brazil - it is the most traditional award of the segment, the "Online Retail Oscar".

This award is a way of recognizing the stores that provide a quality service to the customer and, therefore, winning this award is a source of great pride for Brazilian retailers.

Prize awarded to Panvel.com for the year 2015.
Date of recognition of 2016

awards.title: Winner of the Multichannel Management Category - BR Retail Week 2015

awards.description: Internal award by the agency Escala. The prize was awarded by Game Conecta - a project developed for the client Unisinos.

contributors.headline: Customer Experience| E-commerce Marketing| Omnichannel| Analytics Translator | Martech | Global T-shaped marketer

profile_positions.description:
Facilitating eCommerce marketing efforts for three brands (Giant, CADEX, Liv) at a global level, supporting 17 regional and local teams.
My role involves establishing strong connections between local teams, Martech, partners and marketing. I am dedicated to enabling seamless collaboration and effective communication across these diverse stakeholders. A significant aspect of my work involves empowering the local teams to leverage the Martech stack and optimize e-commerce marketing strategies. I strive to drive greater efficiency and deliver exceptional customer-centric experiences by enhancing digital capabilities and implementing targeted marketing initiatives. My passion lies in fostering cross-functional synergy and utilizing data-driven insights to achieve remarkable results in e-commerce marketing and overall business growth.
profile_positions.title: Global eCommerce Marketing Manager

company.name: O3 Enterprise S.r.l. - Zucchetti Group company

profile_positions.company: O3 Enterprise S.r.l. - Zucchetti Group company
profile_positions.description:
I’ve been working with an amazing, dynamic team to develop the company’s Marketing and CRM Strategy, as well as its sustainable international growth.

I was promoted into this role where, I am proud to say, we have expanded our international partners network, created more brand awareness engaging our distributors, which has been boosting our reputation as value-creators partners.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager & International Business Developer

profile_positions.company: O3 Enterprise S.r.l. - Zucchetti Group company
profile_positions.description: After the completion of my project started in the mandatory internship period, I was hired and implemented the company's marketing area, prioritizing the definition of objectives, market positioning and internal and external communication strategy.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: Continuing the project started in the internship at the previous company, I was responsible for organizing the company's participation in the largest trade show in the radiological sector in Brazil, while developing the communication strategy and managing the partner/distributor.
profile_positions.title: Business Developer Brazil

company.name: Casa Internazionale delle Donne di Trieste

profile_positions.company: Casa Internazionale delle Donne di Trieste
profile_positions.description: Business Plan teacher for the "Donne Impresa FVG" project, an empowerment and training program, for women who want to carry out a self-employment or entrepreneurial project linked to products or services that enhance our territory (for example in the context of tourism, culture, catering, etc.). Created by the International Women's House of Trieste and with funding from the Municipality of Trieste.
profile_positions.title: Guest Teacher

profile_positions.description:
As part of the Origini Program (a grant offered by the Italian Government), two business plans were developed for Italian start-ups, one focused on the medical area and the other on the cosmetics area, to enter the Brazilian market through research and planning.

The business plans include: country analysis, market analysis and financial and marketing plans. 

The project was selected among the top 3 and a job offer was offered by one of the companies.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Specialist - Post-Graduate Intern

profile_positions.description: My mission here was to help create a new digital mindset within one of the most prominent pharmacy conglomerates in Brazil. I did this by integrating macro-trends and e-commerce data to reveal potential business opportunities to stakeholders that doubled conversion rates and boosted market share. I also partnered with e-commerce, APP developers and UX / UI designers in order to create a unified approach to promotion strategy and boost sales by 30%. One of the activities I most enjoyed, though, was harnessing the power of our internal teams to translate our business objectives to the agencies’ creative teams in order to come up with branding and promotion strategies that blew our clients away in amazement.
profile_positions.title: Ecommerce Marketing Manager

profile_positions.location: Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil
profile_positions.description: One of the most interesting initiatives I conducted here was managing the organization's e-commerce marketing strategy. My approach was absolutely data-based: I created statistical analysis models and promotional campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Ecommerce Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description: I was honored to accept the invitation to return to GlobalComm, this time to create cultural change within Piccadilly Shoes, one of the most prominent consumer goods brands, present in 100 countries with more than 7.000 points of sale and revenues of $100MI. In order to do so, I anticipated the 2018 D2C e-commerce wave through careful trends analyses. I also engaged the creative, planning, and business teams, and helped to foster a data-driven mentality within the organization by facilitating workshops to leverage engagement, ROAS and ROI scores.
profile_positions.title: Data Intelligence Analyst

profile_positions.description: I love a good challenge, and at Escala I got to roll up my sleeves and craft customer relations, and digital communications & social media plans, in projects blending creative, CRM, social media and PR areas. Other than design the project strategy, I was responsible for monitoring and optimizing KPI's.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description: Here, I created and executed online relationship initiatives, monitoring and analyzing results of projects that involved the creative, CRM, media, social media and digital PR areas.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Assistant

profile_positions.description:
This was my first opportunity with GlobalComm, where they entrusted me with the
budget forecast and production

profile_positions.description: This was my debut into the world of marketing, which led me down the path where I am today: an e-commerce, omnichannel and digital marketing powerhouse who thrives in organisations that bring awesome business results while serving thegreater good.

company.name: Diverse Leaders in Tech, powered by Techleap.nl

volunteer_experiences.description: A world-class network of like-minded peers on a mission to create a more diverse and inclusive tech ecosystem.

Member of the MIB Alumni Board Association with participants from more than 100 countries, aiming to contribute to our never-ending learning and updating process. Working with 12 board colleagues in a team work effort to improve the community. 

Contributed to 3 Annual Alumni Reunions by influencing topic decisions, gender balance and supporting speakers. 
Ideator of the Alumni Business Corner of the Reunion, allowing alumni to share their entrepreneurial endeavours. 
Responsible for the roll-out of MIB Networking Cafe's aperitivo graphic designs.
Creator of the MIB Chapter Amsterdam.

company.name: Grupo Digital RS - Regional Group of Digital Professionals

volunteer_experiences.description:
During the period, I was part of the development of Grupo Digital RS, (Regional Digital Group) a group of professionals that aimed to expand knowledge and discussion about the digital environment in the regional market (Rio Grande do Sul - Brazilian Region).

Through online content and monthly workshops, we sought to integrate professionals with experience in the field with people who were interested in or starting out, in order to create a network and expand knowledge.

During the period, more than 20 events were held and recognition of the regional market and press.

The project ended to shape other projects, both professional and personal, by the members.

While attending university, I wanted to be in touch with the market and them. I became a volunteer at a local young culture portal, being responsible for researching trends in art, culture, behavior, specially innovative information coming from other countries.
